COLD.DESCRIPTION: A Cool enemy deals 15% less damage with Attacks. If a Cool enemy becomes #yHot, remove it, deal double its Cool amount in damage and apply #yThermal #yShock for 1 turn.

CORPOREAL.DESCRIPTION: A Corporeal card is any card that did not start the turn in your hand, draw pile, or discard pile.

FLOW.DESCRIPTION: When you Flow, you may discard any number of cards. You draw that many at the start of your next turn.

Heat.DESCRIPTION: A Hot enemy takes 30% increased damage from Attacks. If a Hot enemy becomes #yCool, remove it, deal double its Hot amount in damage and apply #yThermal #yShock for 1 turn.

SWAPPABLE.DESCRIPTION: A Swappable card is #yPaired with another card and, while selected, can be freely #ySwapped between the two. (Default key: Spacebar)

TRANSMUTE.DESCRIPTION: Transforms a card in combat into any card of the same rarity available to your current run.

THERMAL_SHOCK.DESCRIPTION: A Shocked enemy deals 15% less damage with and takes 30% more damage from Attacks. Applying any #yCold or #yHeat to this enemy will instead increase this duration by 1 turn.
